title: [Large-Scale] Web-Based Virtual Simulation for Anaerobic Digester Process Control and Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemical engineering and biotechnology knowledge, including fundamental process control concepts
context.additional_context: Corporate job competency enhancement program providing hands-on experience through web-based virtual simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can independently adjust key operational parameters of an anaerobic digester through web-based virtual simulation.
Learners can derive process optimization strategies by analyzing simulation results.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate the impact of design variable changes on system performance.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
